remarks: A Dirichlet character is nonzero on the units of ` Z/nZ ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dchrmhm.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.b $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrn0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Z ) $.
dchrn0.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` Z ) $.
dchrn0.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrn0.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
dchrn0 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X ` A ) =/= 0 <-> A e. U ) ) $.
